name: django-backend
description: Backend (Django) sources for the CS Toolkit
author: ZechyW

scripts.dev: cross-env DJANGO_PORT=${DJANGO_PORT:8080} DJANGO_DEBUG=1 REACT_HOST=${REACT_HOST:127.0.0.1} REACT_PORT=${REACT_PORT:3000} poetry run python manage.py runserver $DJANGO_PORT
scripts.start: cross-env DJANGO_PORT=${DJANGO_PORT:8080} poetry run daphne -b 0.0.0.0 -p $DJANGO_PORT app.asgi:application
